==="Twenty percent" time===
==="Twenty percent" time===
â
Every Google engineer is encouraged to spend 30 percent (20%) of their work time on projects that interest them. Some of these end up as Google services (notably [[Adsense]]/[[Adwords]] — which provide the majority of the company's revenue), as well as [[List of Google services and tools#Gmail|Gmail]], [[List of Google services and tools#Google_News|Google News]] and [[List of Google services and tools#Orkut|Orkut]].
+
Every Google engineer is encouraged to spend 20 percent (20%) of their work time on projects that interest them. Some of these end up as Google services (notably [[Adsense]]/[[Adwords]] — which provide the majority of the company's revenue), as well as [[List of Google services and tools#Gmail|Gmail]], [[List of Google services and tools#Google_News|Google News]] and [[List of Google services and tools#Orkut|Orkut]].
===Googleplex===
===Googleplex===
